Jakarta Server Faces API v3.0.0

Uses of Class
com.sun.faces.push.WebsocketSessionManager

Packages that use WebsocketSessionManager
Package Description
com.sun.faces.push  

  • Uses of WebsocketSessionManager in com.sun.faces.push

    Constructors in com.sun.faces.push with parameters of type WebsocketSessionManager
    Constructor Description
    WebsocketPushContext​(String channel, WebsocketSessionManager socketSessions, WebsocketUserManager socketUsers)
    Creates a socket push context whereby the mutable map of session and view scope channel identifiers is referenced, so it's still available when another thread invokes WebsocketPushContext.send(Object) during which the session and view scope is not necessarily active anymore.
